1.Name: Fire
1.Description: When the Strand of Fire rules the sky, forge-fires roar as if bellows work themselves and even the timid feel the call of rising flame.
1.Low_Effect:
Fire deal +1 die. 
fire creatures gain +1 damage.
1.Mid_Effect:
Fire spells die size increases one step. 
fire creatures gain +1 AC and +2 damage.
1.High_Effect:
Fire spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
fire creatures gain +2 AC and +5 damage, and become common.

2.Name: Poison
2.Description: Alchemists clutch their antidotes: a single drop can fell an ox, and the marshes hiss with viridian mist.
2.Low_Effect:
Poison damage rolls deal +1 die. 
creatures suffer -1 on saving throws against poison.
2.Mid_Effect:
Poison damage die size increases one step. 
venomous beasts gain +1 AC and +1 attack.
2.High_Effect:
Poison spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
plagues spread swiftly and venomous swarms gather.

3.Name: Steam
3.Description: Kettles scream, bathhouses vanish in fog, and geysers burst where none stood before.
3.Low_Effect:
Fog- or mist-creating spells cover +5 ft radius. 
fire or water spells that create steam deal +1 die.
3.Mid_Effect:
Misty terrain counts as lightly obscured. 
steam mephits gain +1 AC and +1 attack.
3.High_Effect:
Mist or steam spells are cast one level higher. 
vision beyond 60 ft in heavy mist is impossible without magic. 
There is a global mist cover

5.Name: Momentum
5.Description: Sages say the world tilts on hidden gears this week; weights grow fickle and a single push can send wagons skidding for furlongs.
5.Low_Effect:
Levitation, jump and feather-fall last twice as long. Two handed weaponds deal +1dmg. 
grapple and shove checks gain +1.
5.Mid_Effect:
Forced movement increases by 5 ft. Two handed weaponds deal +1die. 
fall damage is reduced by 1 die.
5.High_Effect:
Mass-altering spells are cast one level higher and double duration. 
fall damage is halved worldwide.

7.Name: Fate
7.Description: Oracles hear dice rattle in the sky; every choice feels balanced on a hair.
7.Low_Effect:
Portent dice gain +1. 
 Creatures may reroll one missed attack per long rest.
7.Mid_Effect:
Future-glimpsing spells die size increases one step or answer one extra question. 
 Creatures add +1d4 to a failed save once per short rest.
7.High_Effect:
Fate-bending spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
critical hits occres on one extra number down.

10.Name: Metal
10.Description: The air rings like a distant anvil; ore smelts cleaner, and smiths claim their hammers strike true without their guiding hand.
10.Low_Effect:
Tool checks to work metal have advantage. 
metal golems gain +1 AC.
10.Mid_Effect:
Metalworking time halves and produces masterwork quality. 
metal golems gain +2 AC and +1 damage.
10.High_Effect:
Metal weapons or armour forged this week count as +1 magic. 
metal golems gain +3 AC and +2 damage.

11.Name: Earth
11.Description: Mountains seem to breathe; deep roots stir and miners swear they can feel the stone listening to their picks.
11.Low_Effect:
Earth or stone spells deal +1 die. 
burrowing or stone creatures gain +1 AC.
11.Mid_Effect:
Earth or stone spells die size increases one step. 
stone golems gain +2 AC and +1 damage.
11.High_Effect:
Earth or stone spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
stone creatures appear more often.

14.Name: Echo
14.Description: Whisper in a vault this week and the walls answer back; tavern songs carry for miles on still air.
14.Low_Effect: Bardic Inspiration die size increases one step. \Sonic spells deal +1 die.
14.Mid_Effect:
Sonic spells force disadvantage. 
bards regain one expended inspiration die on a short rest.
14.High_Effect:
Verbal-component spells may be cast as bonus actions if spoken twice. 
sound elementals roam caverns.

18.Name: Arcana
18.Description: Raw magic crackles like wildfire; even lanterns spark with colored wisps.
18.Low_Effect:
Magical and Spell attack rolls gain +1 to hit. 
wizards recover one extra slot on arcane recovery.
18.Mid_Effect:
Magical damage die size increases one step. 
scroll-crafting time halves.
18.High_Effect:
Spells cast with their highest available slot count as one level higher. 
wild surges possible on spells 6th level or higher.

22.Name: Lightning
22.Description: Cloud-herders report storms that herd themselves, and children's hair stands on end even under clear skies.
22.Low_Effect:
Lightning & thunder spells deal +1 die. 
ranged metal ammunition gains minor shock damage.
22.Mid_Effect:
Lightning & thunder spells die size increases one step. 
creatures that fly or wear metal have -1 AC.
22.High_Effect:
Lightning spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
storm elementals become common.

26.Name: Glass
26.Description: Sunlight prisms through every windowpane, and shards hum with pent-up resonance.
26.Low_Effect: Shield spell grants +6 AC if cast with a mirror or crystal focus; piercing weapons deal +1 dmg. Armour made looses -1 AC.
26.Mid_Effect: Creatures attacking through glass have advantage; shatter's radius +5 ft; piercing weapons deal +1 die. Armour made looses -2 AC.
26.High_Effect: Any spell cast through a lens or mirror counts as one level higher; glass mephits roam city rooftops. Armour made looses -3 AC.

29.Name: Clockwork
29.Description: Every street-clock ticks in perfect unison and unattended gears clack into patterns too intricate for mortal hands.
29.Low_Effect:
Mechanical crafting time halves. 
animated objects gain +10 ft speed.
29.Mid_Effect:
Haste's extra action can be used for any one-handed weapon attack. 
constructs heal 1 HP each round.
29.High_Effect:
New minor constructs spontaneously assemble in workshops. 
artificer infusions last one extra day per level.

32.Name: Growth
32.Description: Seeds sprout overnight and ivy creeps so fast you can see it climb; shepherds swear lambs grow a week in a single day.
32.Low_Effect:
Nature spells heal or deal +1 die. 
animals and plant creatures gain +1 attack.
32.Mid_Effect:
Nature spells die size increases one step. 
beasts and plants gain +1 AC and +1 attack.
32.High_Effect:
Nature spells cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
beasts and plants flourish and gather in greater numbers.

36.Name: Silence
36.Description: Footfalls fade, speech feels muffled, and even thunder is swallowed at the horizon.
36.Low_Effect: Stealth checks gain +1d4; verbal-component spells take +1 action unless whispered.
36.Mid_Effect: Silence spell radius +10 ft; creatures have disadvantage to locate targets by sound.
36.High_Effect: Verbal-component spells fail unless cast in magical silence; shadow-silent stalkers emerge in the hush.

38.Name: Serenity
38.Description: A hush blankets battlefields; quarrelsome hearts find their anger cooled as temple bells sound softer and sweeter.
38.Low_Effect:
Healing spells add the caster's proficiency bonus. 
creatures may spend an action to end the frightened condition on themselves.
38.Mid_Effect:
At combat start, creatures must pass a Wis save or cannot take the Attack action during round one. 
short rests grant 1 temporary HP per Hit Die spent.
38.High_Effect:
Mass healing word gains +2 dice and removes one condition. 
fiends suffer disadvantage on rolls to frighten others.

41.Name: Mirage
41.Description: Roads shimmer with phantom oases; travelers share confessions with their own reflections.
41.Low_Effect:
Illusion spell DC increases by +1. 
hide checks in heat-haze gain +1d4.
41.Mid_Effect:
Illusion spells die size increases one step or affect one extra target. 
saves to disbelieve illusions are at disadvantage.
41.High_Effect:
Illusion spells are cast one level higher and automatically sucseed agains non-magical sight. 
mirage creatures drift into markets.

45.Name: Ice
45.Description: Breath hangs silver even beside midsummer fires, and lakes chime like crystal under phantom frost.
45.Low_Effect:
Cold spells deal +1 die. 
cold creatures gain +1 AC.
45.Mid_Effect:
Cold spells die size increases one step. 
cold creatures gain +1 attack and +1 AC.
45.High_Effect:
Cold spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
cold elementals become common.

52.Name: Chaos
52.Description: Street dice tumble on their own and candles burn backward; diviners pack up shop until the madness passes.
52.Low_Effect:
Sorcerers roll on the Wild-Magic table only on a 2; rolling a 1 triggers two results. 
once per day, a random cantrip replaces an expended 1st-level slot.
52.Mid_Effect:
When up-casting, on a 6 (1d6) a random metamagic effect is free. 
chaos spells deal +1 die.
52.High_Effect:
Each dawn roll on a Chaos Events table. 
slaadi eggs hatch instantly and reality flickers.

57.Name: Dreams
57.Description: Sleepwalkers tread moonlit roads, murmuring secrets; some wake with stardust on their boots.
57.Low_Effect:
Sleep spells affect +1 die HD. 
a short rest grants a cryptic omen.
57.Mid_Effect:
Divination cast while resting needs no material component. 
creatures woken suddenly roll initiative at disadvantage.
57.High_Effect:
Sleeping creatures are treated as on the Ethereal Plane for magic. 
night-hags and dream predators become common.

63.Name: Shadow
63.Description: Lantern-flames gutter low and every alley seems to stretch a mile deeper than memory swears it should. This is a time where all turn the lights low.
63.Low_Effect:
Darkvision range doubles. 
Stealth checks in dim light gain +1d4.
63.Mid_Effect:
Darkness created this week counts as magical. 
shadow-step abilities recharge on a short rest.
63.High_Effect:
Necrotic spells ignore resistance. 
In the pressance of strong light(none sun light), shadows peel off walls as hostile creatures.

64.Name: Tempest
64.Description: Wind lashes rain sideways; gusts strong enough to topple signposts burst from clear skies, Sailers stay ashore.
64.Low_Effect:
Wind or weather spells deal +1 die or push +5 ft further. 
flying creatures suffer –1 AC in open air.
64.Mid_Effect:
Wind spells die size increases one step. 
ranged weapon attacks take –1 to hit outdoors.
64.High_Effect:
Weather-control spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
air elementals spawn amid whirlwinds.

68.Name: Reflection
68.Description: Mirrors mist over with images a heartbeat late and puddles show skies no eye has seen since the world was young.
68.Low_Effect:
Shield grants +6 AC. 
mirror image conjures one extra duplicate.
68.Mid_Effect:
If a ranged attack misses you, it has a 1d6 chanse to rebound at the attacker for half damage. 
illusion saves are made at disadvantage.
68.High_Effect:
Counterspell automatically succeeds against spells of 5th level or lower. 
glass spirits and mirror oozes wander city streets.

71.Name: Blood
71.Description: Wells run warm and every heartbeat drums like war-chant; healers taste iron on the wind.
71.Low_Effect:
Self-sacrifice: Spend 1 hit dice to add +1d4+1 damage or healing after hit for 8 hours. 
 Heal 1 hp on hit.
71.Mid_Effect:
Self-sacrifice: Spend 1 hit dice to add +2d4+2 damage or healing after hit for 8 hours. 
creatures at 0 HP make death saves at disadvantage.
71.High_Effect:
Self-sacrifice: Spend 2 hit dice to power a spell two levels higher. 
vampires regenerate even in sunlight.

73.Name: Silk
73.Description: Courtiers glide like dancers; even brawlers find their strikes curiously graceful.
73.Low_Effect:
Charm spells DC +1. 
Persuasion checks gain +1d4.
73.Mid_Effect:
Charm spells die size increases one step or affect one extra target. 
attacks of opportunity against allies are at disadvantage.
73.High_Effect:
Charm and compulsion spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
Persuasion checks gain +2d4.

81.Name: Undeath
81.Description: Gravedirt stirs, clocks pause at midnight and ravens learn new words to whisper at windowsills.
81.Low_Effect:
Necromancy spells deal +1 die. 
undead appear slightly more often.
81.Mid_Effect:
Necromancy spells die size increases one step. 
undead gain +1 AC and healing magic is reduced by one die.
81.High_Effect:
Necromancy, Reanimation and revival spells are cast one level higher, necrotic resistance is ignored. 
undead are empowered and common; healing spells suffer -2 dice.

82.Name: Rot
82.Description: Fruit browns on the branch and carrion beetles darken the sky.
82.Low_Effect:
Necrotic spells deal +1 die. 
nonmagical food spoils twice as fast.
82.Mid_Effect:
Necrotic spells die size increases one step. 
saving throws vs disease are at disadvantage.
82.High_Effect:
Necrotic spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
blights multiply in sewers and cellars.

86.Name: Spirit
86.Description: Ancestral voices whisper in hearth-fires and offerings vanish before hands withdraw.
86.Low_Effect:
Spirit-summoning or speaking spells last +5 min or deal +1 die. 
undead gain +1 attack.
86.Mid_Effect:
Spirit spells die size increases one step. 
undead saves against turning are at disadvantage.
86.High_Effect:
Spirit spells are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
ancestor shades openly guard their bloodlines.

88.Name: Sight
88.Description: Seers blink amber and claim to read yesterday's footprints; even common folk speak truths they could not know.
88.Low_Effect:
Divination spells range increases by 30 ft. 
study checks gain +1 die.
88.Mid_Effect:
Divination spells die size increases one step. 
Perception and Investigation checks gain advantage.
88.High_Effect:
Divination spells are cast one level higher and ignore concentration. 
study checks automatically succeed on DC 15 or lower.

90.Name: Radiance
90.Description: Dawn breaks brilliant white-gold and shadows flee screaming; bells toll with crystal clarity heard leagues away.
90.Low_Effect:
Light and daylight spells impose disadvantage on undead attacks. 
undead in bright light take 1 radiant damage at turn start.
90.Mid_Effect:
Radiant spells heal the caster for half the radiant damage dealt once per turn. 
healing spells gain +1 die in direct sunlight.
90.High_Effect:
Sunbeam and sunburst are cast one level higher and ignore resistance. 
undead in sunlight suffer -2 on all rolls.

91.Name: Valor
91.Description: Drums pound in hearts and ballads spring unbidden from every tongue.
91.Low_Effect:
Allies gain +1 temporary HP at dawn. 
fear saves have advantage.
91.Mid_Effect:
Inspiring spells die size increases one step or duration doubles. 
allies add +1 to attack rolls while within 10 ft of each other.
91.High_Effect:
Heroism becomes an area effect of 50ft that lasts 1 hour. 
allies who drop to 0 HP rise at 1 HP once per day.

96.Name: Travel
96.Description: Road-markers shift closer together, horses find second wind and door-arches sometimes open onto places they never have before.
96.Low_Effect:
Teleportation and speed spells increase range by 25 %. 
creatures' dash speed increases by 5 ft.
96.Mid_Effect:
Travel spells die size increases one step or range by 50 %. 
creatures' base speed increases by 10 ft.
96.High_Effect:
Travel spells are cast one level higher and ignore teleport mishap. 
creatures' base speed increases by 15 ft and teleportation arrives unerringly.
